title: "ERRROR Inventory Unavaliable!" bug?
body:
Im trying to do Team builder (I know right).
and I just got that ^ message and it wont let me do it wot?

replies.body: How strange. Seems most likely a bug, not a problem on your end. Maybe consider [reporting it as a bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), especially if you can figure out what causes it to occur.
